item.description:
Let's meet up to see this profanity laden new comedy from Seth Rogen for free! Go here to claim free passes for this advanced screening:
https://www.gofobo.com/rsvp/promotion/110ee027d78c8b5396be1b4626a06ec7

Synopsis: While attending a party at James Franco's house, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel and many other celebrities are faced with the apocalypse. RATED R: RESTRICTED FOR CRUDE AND SEXUAL CONTENT THROUGHOUT, BRIEF GRAPHIC NUDITY, PERVASIVE LANGUAGE, DRUG USE AND SOME VIOLENCE.

Check out this VERY Not Safe For Work red band trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ok1Os-EpScs

They always give out more passes than seats are available, so we'll need to show up early. I intend to be there around 6:15 after grabbing something to eat at The Rockbottom.
item.name: "This Is The End" free screening.
